overview: Herbert Campbell is filmed here in the Biograph studio, which was situated at that time on the Thames Embankment. Campbell is dressed as 'Little Bobby' for the 1899-1900 Drury Lane pantomime 'Cinderella'. He is seated at table in front of large meal, with a glass of beer beside him. He eats messily, then drinks the beer in one and grins at the camera.
title: Herbert Campbell As Little Bobby
